name: Joystream
introduce: Joystream is a blockchain video platform that allows developers to build applications on, opening up opportunities to create decentralized versions of video applications. Joystream aims to give video creators alternative ways to monetize their videos, and not solely rely on advertising, with the ability to sell their content as NFTs and to turn their channel into a token, so that anyone can invest in the creator, and earn a share of their revenue.
